summary: Very small mod that does one thing, make soul gems lighter.
descriptionHtml:
Okay guys, this is my first released mod for Skyrim. It may not be that amazing, but that\'s because this was initially just an ESP tweak that I used for myself. What this does is cut the weight of soul gems in half. I never could get used to seeing these black soul gems, that when dropped were only 2-4x the size of a diamond (weighing 0.1), so I started editing. This makes it easier to carry a few more gems while still maintianing the normal gameplay of skyrim (and you can carry twice as many soul gems now. Heh)

Installation:
Place in the Skyrim Data folder, launch skyrim, and activate the ESP

Uninstallation: 
Deactivate and Delete the ESP.

Leave feedback, if this is plain s*** then let me know
author: Supermanikan
